itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Bares Amulet developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Bares Amulet.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Amulet of Crimson Flame, Bares Amulet of Destruction, Bares Amulet of Temptation, Bares Amulet

item.name: Steel
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards and Coal together. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Pure Platinum Crystal
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Platinum Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Fine Fancy Fur
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying waragon or cheetah hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Trace of Battle
item.desc: A material used for Crafting equipment.\nIt can be Excavated at Bernianto Farm.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Bares Amulet of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Bares Amulet.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Amulet.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Amulet of Crimson Flame, Bares Amulet

item.name: Grade 3 Weapon Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 3rd-grade weapon upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Bares Amulet
item.desc: An amulet possessed with a hatred for all living things.

item.name: Bares Amulet of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Bares Amulet.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Amulet.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Amulet of Temptation, Bares Amulet

item.name: Bares Amulet of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Bares Amulet.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Amulet.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Amulet of Destruction, Bares Amulet

item.name: Bares Amulet of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Bares Amulet.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Amulet.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Amulet of Crimson Flame, Bares Amulet
